content: stitch as if to purl holding the yarn in back k5 * end round with s1 k4 k2tog knit 2 stitches together means that you should knit the ssk slip 1 stitch from left needle to right needle as if to first stitch then slip 1 knit 5 knit without actually knitting it slip 2nd stitch from left to over and over until you are right needle also as if to knit insert the tip of the left needle almost at the end of the round into these slipped stitches from left to right in front of the you will have 5 stitches left in right needle tip wrap yarn around the right needle the the round slip the first one and normal way and knit the two slipped stitches together then knit four using this yarn color designed by anne kamsvaag all rights reserved page 4 © 2017 anne kamsvaag do not copy translate these 3 charts if your main color used for the ribbing is dark and the contrast color is light abbreviations mc main color * * stitch instructions between cc contrast color the two stars should be repeated m1 make a new stitch you can use any increase method over and over until the end of the k knit round for example k1 * s1 s1 slip one stitch as if to purl holding the yarn in back k5 * end round with s1 k4 k2tog knit 2 stitches together means that you should knit the ssk slip 1 stitch from left needle to right needle as if to first stitch then slip 1 knit 5 knit without actually knitting it slip 2nd stitch from left to over and over until you are right needle also as if to knit insert the tip of the left needle almost at the end of the round into these slipped stitches from left to right in front of the you will have 5 stitches left in right needle tip wrap yarn around the right needle the the round slip the first one and normal way and knit the two slipped stitches together then knit four using this yarn color designed by anne kamsvaag all rights reserved page 7 © 2017 anne kamsvaag do not copy translate distribute or publish without prior written consent use
